mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum cnt, w.* from work w where 1=1 and subject like '%'||#{subject}||'%' and id like '%'||#{id}||'%' ORDER BY WORKNO DESC) where cnt between #{start} and #{end}
select * from ( select rownum cnt, w.* from work w where 1=1 and subject like '%'||#{subject}||'%' and id like '%'||#{id}||'%') where cnt between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from work where 1=1 and subject like '%'||#{subject}||'%' and id like '%'||#{id}||'%'
SELECT w.*, e.ENAME FROM WORKREP w, EMP e WHERE WORKNO = #{WORKNO} AND w.id = e.id ORDER BY no
SELECT w.NO, f.* FROM WORKREP w, FILES f WHERE w.FNO = f.FNO(+) AND w.WORKNO = #{WORKNO} ORDER BY NO

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum cnt, g.* FROM (SELECT * FROM gantt ORDER BY START_date desc) g, project p WHERE g.PRJNO = p.PRJNO AND p.prjno=#{prjno} AND g.text like '%'||#{text}||'%') WHERE cnt BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
SELECT count(*) FROM gantt g, project p WHERE g.PRJNO =p.PRJNO AND p.prjno=#{prjno} AND g.text like '%'||#{text}||'%'
SELECT DISTINCT e.* FROM GANTT g, PROJECTMEMBER p, EMP e WHERE g.OWNER = e.ENAME AND e.ID = p.OWNER AND g.id = #{id}

SELECT g1.*,to_char(to_date(g1.START_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') + g1.duration,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS end_date, g2.text AS parentText from gantt g1 LEFT join gantt g2 ON g1.PARENT =g2.ID where g1.prjno=#{prjno} AND g1.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE GANTT SET state = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE GANTT SET state = 0 WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE GANTT SET apprv = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
